name: Vehicle Stunt Simulator (v5)
description:
========================================================

VSS is under development and in alpha phase, being developed by a sole hobbyist developer for over few years in order to learn new game engine and programming. The game usually updates once a month.  Check unofficial feature demonstrations on Youtube- https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCY_yKMLRrGlXh0sTSuRCOIg

Once you pay, you will receive all future updates via your paypal email id that you used to pay for this game. Updates once a month. Currently on hold, new update will come later but with big updates to UI and possibly with new car models.

We are collecting funds ($70) to replace all the car models with better quality and interactive models that turn into several pieces if damaged.

Thanks for all your support.

=========================================================

For Dual Core Laptops, 3GB Ram-
Once in game Press F1, F2, F3, Click Fastest to remove shadows (on screen top left ),heavily reduced lag ,FPS will be around 50
